website_summaries.verdict: Some of the largest beef sticks on the market, as each one weighs 1 oz.
pros: Uses grass-fed beef and non-GMO citric acid with no added nitrates or hormones for the safest ingredients
Great choices in terms of the different flavors
Uses a natural beef collagen casing on the beef stick exterior
cons: Occasional quality control problems with stick packaging not sealed properly

customer_reviews.title: Rotten meat
customer_reviews.text: I had a few and yes...they were great. Better than others I tried. Then I opened one and the rancid smell hit me like a ton of bricks. I think something went wrong in the packaging but dang...I now don't want beef jerky anymore. So happy the smell kept me from blindly biting into this mess. I'm sure this is a great company but I've never had something like this happen with beef jerky before.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Way too expensive to not only not be great, but be actually bad
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and the Sogo grass fed beef sticks at the same time to compare. These were almost inedible. Way too expensive to not only not be great, but be actually bad. Tasted old and dry. The Sogo sticks were good. Will buy the Sogo sticks again, won't buy these again. Too bad, had high hopes- not too many healthy, no sugar, reasonably low salt, grass feed, healthy beef snacks out there. Nice try, but missed the mark.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: I'd pass.
customer_reviews.text: I was enjoying these until I pulled out one from the bag, looked really bad. Looked like a cooked jimmy deans sausage. Completely different color than the others. It really put me off the rest of the pack. No thanks.Unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Marsh.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these before without issue. This time I purchased 3 packs ($66) worth, and this is how it came. You can see in the pics that the meat is discolored. I am very disappointed that this passed a quality check to even be sent to me for me or my 8 yr old child to consume. It’s clear to the naked eye that no one should be eating this. I now wasted $66 and will not purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Martel

customer_reviews.title: MOLD!!
customer_reviews.text: Found mold today on one of the sticks. Didn't really check the ones I ate already because I normally eat them while working and driving. Return policy states I can't return or be refunded. Doesn't expire until 2019. I would stay away. They tasted pretty good but that's a waste of money for me to throw the rest of the uneaten away.
customer_reviews.author: richard b

customer_reviews.title: Mold!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a pack of these and enjoyed them and then re-ordered two different kinds for a road/hiking trip. I ate a number of them, then pulled one out and noticed the end was a bit moldy, and that was that. When the trip was over I sorted through the remaining sticks and a few of each kind was molding. Some just a little and some were very rotten by that point. The packaging appeared to be in-tact for all of them. I don't know what happened, but I will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Foord

customer_reviews.title: probably just one bad batch. Every one I've gotten has had a ...
customer_reviews.text: I've never got a rotten one, seems most of the reviews on here complaining of that are from some time ago, probably just one bad batch. Every one I've gotten has had a tight seal and many have survived several days riding around (sealed, out of direct sunlight) in my car for several hot summer days and still been fine when I ate them. I have to keep buying them because house mates will eat them if they see them, so I also have to hide some of them away for myself. That should tell you what you need to know.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Nearly injured myself
customer_reviews.text: This pressure wrapped mini logs of fire are not what I was expecting. These are the normal, the mild, and each bite sent my mouth into another level of flaming hell. I mean even Geo, who *loves* meat sticks, refused them after 1 bite that sent him running to slurp up the entire contents of his water dish and beg for more. And they are overstuffed, so there are no packets of goodness to explode into your mouth when you bite into them, only the feeling of chomping onto a tire. I would write more but I can't see through my watering eyes. I'm saying no, less than a tenth of a star out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Vicat

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This thing had the opposite of flavor. It was so bland and boring. There was nothing good about it at all. Complete waste of money. I have Crohn's and I'm very meticulous about the foods we consume and this was disgusting. We couldn't even stomach finishing them. At $22 a box- what a rip off! This is like cooking skinless chicken with nothing, not even salt or pepper.
customer_reviews.author: Ste7ani3

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but NOT for everyone
customer_reviews.text: These might be ok for others, but not for me. Not sure, but I think I'm reacting to the "encapsulated citric acid," as I've never had that before. Ate a couple of these & drank plenty of water, & it just feels like I ate a rubbery wad of preservatives and greased up my intestines. I guess they're ok in a pinch, like on a camping trip, but I only got these b/c of the unresolved quality control issues w/ the EPIC bars on Amazon. I don't react to the EPIC bars, & they don't have "encapsulated citric acid." Those without food intolerances might like these, so I'll say they're ok. -Account holder's progeny
customer_reviews.author: Irving Drew

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad taste.
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to eat healthier and also be more informed about the ingredients in my food. This is a great alternative to the major brands that are not as healthy. I do not like spicy things. This has a little bit of a kick to it. So, I’d definitely make sure you have something to drink close by, but it tastes great otherwise. As a comparison I had some beef jerky the other day that was supposedly healthier just like this and that was way spicier than this. So my point is do not let the “kick” part that I mentioned dissuade you from trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah123

customer_reviews.title: Warning
customer_reviews.text: Be warned everyone who may be interested in purchasing these Grass Fed Beef sticks.... It is hard to eat just one, these are soooooo delicious that after one taste you will defiantly break into the next one and the next! I literally had to hide mine on the top shelf of the cupboard to keep me from binging! Perfect for KETO, grass fed beef, high in protein, NO Nitrates, NO sugar so low low low in carbs! And part of the profits go to a very good cause - I suggest you read about their mission! Buy these you will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best I have ever eaten!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I have ordered this product and I was NOT given any free product to do this review. The beef sticks were exceptionally tasty and actually a little moist which added to the tender texture of the meat. They were not as "greasy tasting" as other beef sticks I had purchased in the past. I am wondering if this is because the grass fed meat generally doesn't have as much fat in it as non grass fed meat? Easily the BEST I have ever eaten!
customer_reviews.author: E. Butka

customer_reviews.title: These Do Not Taste Like A "Slim Jim" If that is what you are looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that they tasted (with seasonings) to taste like a Slim Jim. They do not. They tasted ok, but not great according to my taste buds, which is too bad as I hope that they would. Also they do not have the that outer rough texture that a Slim Jim has, more smooth like, like the meat had been pressured pressed inside the plastic wrapper. As I said before, if they could have come close to the seasonings and taste of a Slim Jim or one of the Italian salami ones, I would have bought more . Maybe it has to do with trying to make it Keto friendly . Cheers !
customer_reviews.author: BeachBumBob

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, do not purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: buyers beware, this product is tough in texture, and really not good in taste, and you can't even return the product. Waste of money, do not purchase!!!! Hardly any beef flavor, taste more like it used more fat, and the skin is very very tough to chew through. For the price, it is not acceptable, and wouldn't even be acceptable at half the price I purchased this for.
customer_reviews.author: Bandith P.

customer_reviews.title: Update:
customer_reviews.text: These were not made in Columbia, however, I did find out that the company imports 50% of their product from New Zealand which is a bit concerning. I don't know if this is a practice for companies like this to seek biologically consumed product from so far away, especially for a company in the mid-west of USA. With that being said, the company has been good to communicate with and did address my concerns, however, regardless of an FDA label on the packaging, I simply don't trust having "meat" brought in from New Zealand.
customer_reviews.author: MassNative

customer_reviews.title: Great snack for Atkins and Keto dieters!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these meat sticks. They are not as fatty as traditional meat sticks such as Slim Jims which is a plus for me(always hated the greasy aftertaste). The only thing I’m unhappy with is the price. Very expensive. I still give it a five star rating though not sure if I can afford to keep buying them for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Katt Williams

customer_reviews.title: INEDIBLE! TASTED LIKE PURE BLACK PEPPER
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst beef sticks I have ever eaten. I eat spicy foods & enjoy jalapeno flavored snacks, but these literally tasted like a black pepper stick flavored with a little beef. The only one I ate caused heartburn worse than any food I have eaten for years, even jalapeno poppers or habanero chips. Please replace the word TASTY with the word PEPPERY in your product description.
customer_reviews.author: Nightwalker

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste, plastic like casing.
customer_reviews.text: I was very hopeful for this item. While I cannot deny or confirm that the product is made with high quality ingredients, I can say that they taste awful. The outer casing is like plastic, and the inside flavor of the meat product is not to my liking at all. I have tried all kinds of beef jerky over the years, and this one I am not sure I would even give away.
customer_reviews.author: EES

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering these meat sticks for years without any issues at all. There must've been a problem with sealing a batch as others have expressed but I love these meat sticks! You can't find many, if any, meat sticks that are grass-feed beef and without nitrates and nitrites and expecially without sugar or dextrose (artificial sweetener). I do pay attention to the sticks as I open them just to be sure but, like I said, I have never had a problem!
customer_reviews.author: Jmom

customer_reviews.title: Grey rotten meat
customer_reviews.text: Received rotten meat sticks. I had ordered many times and they were always good. This time the meat was grey and one stick had hair wrapped around it. Will never order again. This company has lost my business.

customer_reviews.title: Mold on beef stick.
customer_reviews.text: Uh-oh... mold on the beef stick! It was just one out of the pack. But since I can’t contact the seller or return, I’m posting here to give warning.
customer_reviews.author: KRH

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but don't come in a glass jar as in the photo....
customer_reviews.text: I'd give this product 5 stars except for the small deception on the product page, which shows the beef sticks in a sealable glass jar. I was a bit surprised that they come in a plastic bag. They are individually wrapped, which is good, and they are shown as such on the product page, but the main pic is of them in a re-sealable glass jar. Others have said they got some bad ones, but all 12 of mine look fine, and taste fine.
customer_reviews.author: WMF

customer_reviews.title: According to the product description it is a very healthy choice in beef stick snacks.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several beef stick products to try. This is my favorite of ALL the Beef Sticks. I am sorry the stars don't go to 10. Fresh, Delicious, Intense flavor, Moist that is what your mouth and mind experience. No MSG, Grass fed beef, A Keto friendly food. This could be a part of a healthy life style. I am Not a Doctor, Nurse or Dietitian, but I understand MSG is a food additive you may want to stay away from. Grass fed beef is supposed to be healthier, I understand its natural and emplies no growth hormones have been used. Over all it is my #1 meat stick. I will order 2 maybe 3 next time I order.
customer_reviews.author: Tom77

customer_reviews.title: Very tastey, firm but not hard and dry
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to find the good reviews of these beef sticks to be true! They are very tasty, with a little "kick" at the end, but not too much. I am sensitive to hot spices, so they may seem milder to those who love hot and spicy stuff. In fact, if they offered a "mild" version, I'd surely buy those! The texture was great. Not dry and hard to bite. Didn't pull your teeth out like some jerky. My husband instantly claimed some to take on hikes. I like that they don't need refrigeration, and I can throw one in my bag for a low carb/keto snack, anytime, anywhere. Big thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Retta Brown

customer_reviews.title: WOW, this is crack in a meat stick,really good stuff
customer_reviews.text: These things are too damn good. I smashed these in one weekend. You do not get the jar. They are a pretty good size too. When I get again I will try and have more restraint and not eat them all up in a couple days. Great texture too, not tough like jerky but mushy like it was a nasty slim jim. This is high quality stuff. I did not think it was worth the price when I bought it but I will say that it most definitely is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Vaughan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Moldy???
customer_reviews.text: I initially gave this product a good review after eating 1 piece. Before buying this I didn't look at the product reviews. But then after I submitted my review I just happened to look at some of the other reviews. I was appalled when I saw how many customers bought this jerkey and found it to be moldy! Ugh! After reading that I couldn't bring myself to eating them anymore and threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description - this is not beef jerky
customer_reviews.text: The product description described this as meat sticks beef jerky and I thought that was getting true beef jerky and not a product that is only a slight grade above the very popular beef sticks that you can purchase in convenience stores. I should have researched it more before I purchased them and at least I only got 12. For what they are, they are good but my taste buds were set on beef jerky.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this product.  IT'S GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: SORRY I CAN'T GIVE A BETTER REPORT ON THIS PRODUCT. RECEIVED FAST AFTER ORDERING. HAD TO LOCK UP OR I WOULD HAVE MISSED OUT. FAMILY LOVES, WANTS MORE, AND WILL BE ORDERED AGAIN AND POSSIBLY AGAIN AND AGAIN. NEXT ORDER WILL BE FOR TWO (2) PKGS. GREAT PRODUCT AND YOU LOVE MEAT STICKS YOU CAN'T GO WRONG WITH THIS PRODUCT. WORD OF CAUTION L O C K I T U P. PS: NOT MY FIRST ORDER.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Cinderfella

customer_reviews.title: Super Tasty Treat
customer_reviews.text: I'll confess, I've never had a beef stick before. But I saw these and really liked that they are 100% grass-fed and that they take care of the land and environment and thought I would give them a try. Got the original. It has a little bite to it, but that is good. Beef stick is moist, not tough and hard...I guess that would be beef jerky. Anyway, I found a new favorite healthy treat. I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: mytweedybear

customer_reviews.title: Give it to the dog.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these. I liked that they didn't have any additives and were a clean source of protein. The taste is just awful. My daughter hated them. I really really tried to finish mine, but couldn't. Had a slight stomach ache after forcing half of it down. My husband also thought they were gross. It's too bad, as I liked the idea and the "mission".
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not right now....
customer_reviews.text: Previously ordered and loved these sticks. Decided to buy them again for our next hiking trip. I thought I would try one before we left. With this last order I ended up getting extremely sick. For 24-48 hours I was super nauseous/diarrhea but never threw up due to measures I took with young living oils to suppress it. I HATE throwing up with a passion so this is what I did. This order I received had no obvious signs of mold or discolorations or packaging failures. Sorry, not risking this again. Thank God I tried this before we left on vacay.
customer_reviews.author: Madness

customer_reviews.title: Wont buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very spicy I won't buy them again I don't like when ingredients aren't officially put in there and told that they're hot if they're spicy I don't want to order something and be surprised, not everyone likes spicy burning your mouth food. The skin is very thick on them generally I was peeling it off most of time before eating it
customer_reviews.author: mick

customer_reviews.title: People's differences
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, it's probably just me, and my stomach. Had to use Tums twice to settle it. I sure was looking forward to enjoy it.it may be due to onion powder to which I'm allergic to onions. It was almost the last ingredient mentioned so hoped it wouldn't face t me. But apparently I was wrong. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please don't change formula!
customer_reviews.text: First time buyer and these are AMAZING without feeling all the guilt. My father recently got diagnosed with diabetes and he is a meat eater 100%. Salad is like "girly" food for him, so I'm so excited for him to try these (I ate 4 already)! I'm sure he will love it and understand healthy can taste good! I read the ingredients and it's everything that I can UNDERSTAND, which is a big plus. For the price you definitely get quality. I will purchase again and again. Delivery was fast and I hope you guys have more of food selections!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I couldnt cancel
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the negative reviews I tried to cancel ,but it had already shipped. Everything looks good with this order. In fact this is my second order and I had no issues with the first one as well. I will update if the product shows any problems, but as already stated I really enjoy these. They travel great ,keeps me on track with my keto or carnivore diet and they are very satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly r

customer_reviews.title: Good and tasty..Just a bit costly
customer_reviews.text: My headline says it all. The beef sticks are very nice. Labeled contents are what we wanted. I understand that producing this product is not cheap to accomplish but others do it for a little less $$. That said, maybe an option for no individual shrink wrapping (for freshness) & maybe bundling a dozen or so, before that shrink wrap, might save some costs which may be passed on to the consumer.?
customer_reviews.author: Mike E.

customer_reviews.title: Great for No Sugar lovers
customer_reviews.text: As a diabetic, I have to try and steer clear of even meat snacks that include sugar to make them taste better. That's why I like these. No sugar and they taste good. A bit costly, but you pay for the quality and not being filled with sugar or other sugar additives. If you want quality and look for no sugar meat snacks you can't go wrong with these. I've purchased them numerous times.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F

customer_reviews.title: Excellant
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with these meat sticks. They taste so much better than what I can buy locally. I will be returning to buy more as they are fast a favorite with me and my husband. Might buy a bunch and give to my kids for Christmas presents as they go camping and hiking a lot and these sticks would be easy for them to take along for snacks.
customer_reviews.author: KE

customer_reviews.title: Don’t suggest this to any one.😒
customer_reviews.text: These taste horrible. Very tough and chewy.Casing makes it hard to eat as well. I also got another pack of 12. I regret it. Will never get this again. Rather just stick to slim Jim’s.🤦🏽‍♂️👎🏾
customer_reviews.author: Clos Stokes

customer_reviews.title: I've found a new go-to snack
customer_reviews.text: This product was even better than I expected. I tried them because of the ingredients which contained nothing that wasn't allowed on my restricted diet. I was most pleasantly surprised with the great taste. Somewhat similar to a brand one can buy at the store, they are not only better tasting, but also didn't leave that greasy coating in your mouth. I absolutely recommend these to those who enjoy beef snacks. So glad I gave them a try.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie E Porter

customer_reviews.title: Texture of these is good, flavor is mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Texture of these is good, flavor is mediocre. If this were the end of the review, I would buy them again. But these meat sticks have that weird fat in them that sticks to the roof of your mouth - it's like this film of fat when you chew them that glazes over your tongue and the roof of your mouth. Not inedible, but I def won't be getting any more.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and without heavy Slim-Jim oils and chems. Kids like it. Price could be better by 10-20%.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and was well described in product description. Very tasty and "real" or "clean" tasting if that makes sense. Not greasy or heavy or artificial in the mouth. My kids gobbled them up for lunch / snack time. Felt good to give them a quality product. Quantity per stick was good. Some sticks are just too small. I don't mind paying for quality, but they are a little expensive by 10-20% to be competitive in this niche, IMHO. I'm just a Dad feeding kids and the rest of the family for school and sports / outdoors. I'm pretty over the whole Keto thing. Still gets 5 stars despite pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Bottom Line Up Front

customer_reviews.title: Good beef sticks, just a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: These are the best beef sticks out there. They are individually wrapped so they stay fresh! I made the mistake of buying some that were not, and they ended up molding before I could finish the package, so that was a total waste of money. I do think these a little on the pricey side, but I suppose that is for the extra packaging to keep them fresh. They are probably the best tasting beef sticks out there and they are nitrate free which is really important. Great little snack for trying to eat low-carb.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kapes

customer_reviews.title: Great protein snack!
customer_reviews.text: You see these beef stick snacks at the checkouts at many stores these day. You're hungry, so you buy one, only to regret it after a couple bites. What am I tasting? Salt? I think that's beef. Why am I still chewing on this thing when I pull into the driveway? The Mission Meat Grass-Fed Beef Sticks are tastier and obviously beefy. You won't need to chug a 64-ounce Slurpee to balance the sodium overload. I buy these because I can carry them with me anywhere and get a little protein snack, which stops me from feeling famished at lunch or dinner.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Nice taste-Needs work
customer_reviews.text: My first time trying these and only a couple of quick observations. First, I am comparing them to my favorite, Dukes Original Smoked Shorty Sausages. The flavor is right on however the mouthfeel is very greasy and the casing is not snappy and hard like real casing. The price is better than Dukes but I just don't enjoy them as much with that greasy feel in my mouth and no snap. If they work towards the two things I mentioned I may switch, otherwise I'll be paying more for the Dukes but enjoying them more.
customer_reviews.author: Oldcaywest

customer_reviews.title: Only the Good Stuff Left...
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality beef snacks. They have a very smooth beef taste, with no fatty coating left in your mouth. The flavoring is a bit mild for my tastes so I dip them when I want. They came well packaged and within the time frame promised. I recommend them and give them to my grandson the hi sch football player to help him beef up with good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these beef sticks!
customer_reviews.text: I've never actually tried "jerky" sticks, so these were my first...I was impressed! I follow the keto diet and had to travel for business last week. I figured pre-wrapped single beef sticks would be a great keto snack: easy to pack, travel, and eat anywhere. These sticks were perfect and fit the bill! They are tasty, the texture is great, and very satisfying. I will caveat that they are wrapped in a "skin" that I removed because it did not appeal to me, but it was easy to remove and toss. Thanks for a healthy snack!
customer_reviews.author: S. Falcone

customer_reviews.title: Should have ordered the Sampler
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these Mainly for my husband who is diabetic ; however I guess living in Louisiana I would’ve preferred to have a little spicier had I ordered a sampler instead of this first order of beef sticks I would’ve had a clear idea of how to re-order Excellent Marketing , product information is impressive.
customer_reviews.author: double e

customer_reviews.title: my husband LOVES them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them for my husband for Father's Day. He recently decided to cut down on the carbs and sugar so a search on Amazon for low carb beef jerky brought these up. To be honest, the photo shows them in a really cute storage container so that is the only reason I purchased this brand. He LOVES them. I am actually back to order MORE right now. p.s. they are NOT sold with the container in the picture, by the way, it may say that and I missed it but since they are so yummy, who cares LOL
customer_reviews.author: A J

customer_reviews.title: pricey, but yummy
customer_reviews.text: These are a little pricey, but they taste really good. I have some autoimmune issues and I can have a hard time eating stuff like this. I didn't have any adverse reactions and it felt good in my body. They get 2 thumbs up from me
customer_reviews.author: rk

customer_reviews.title: Decent snack stick
customer_reviews.text: Second time ordering these. Unlike most other beef sticks I don't feel like I just ate junk food after eating these. Which can be dangerous because I once had these for an entire meal by accident. It really was an accident, I swear! The flavor is mild and peppery whereas most beef sticks are strong in flavor but taste artificial. I bought a few different similar products at the same time a these but I only ordered this one a second time. And in bulk. Taking some to work to keep in my desk.
customer_reviews.author: nimbice

customer_reviews.title: Not consistent quality... almost threw up!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these a few times and the family loved them. They got me through a rough pregnancy with GD too! But the last batch I bought this past week is just awful. The product didn’t dry long enough or something, so the meat is pasty on the inside. My husband will literally eat anything and couldn’t stomach them.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieinChicago

customer_reviews.title: The best Beef Sticks EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product. I bought the smallest quantity first. After tasting one, I could not help but give them to others to try. I had to buy the largest quantity next so my husband could have them. Low in calories, no nitrates, hormones etc. LOVE them
customer_reviews.author: sharon100

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Meat Products
customer_reviews.text: I have the utmost respect for Mission Meats - their customer service is second to none and they stand behind their products. The beef bars and sticks taste excellent and are the perfect portion size. It's a high value product considering the quality of meat for the price. This was a great purchase and I'll be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: RickS

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, delicious Keto / Paleo-Friendly snack
customer_reviews.text: I've always enjoyed beef sticks for a snack but the ones readily available in stores are inflammatory garbage. These grass-fed beef sticks are packed with deliciousness that I don't feel guilty about eating. The quality is amazing and I order more every week or two. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jen B, ND

customer_reviews.title: They are the perfect size, have no funky taste
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars. My family loves these compared to Chomps or Vermont. They are the perfect size, have no funky taste, and are a great snack. I buy them frequently from Amazon and I haven't had the spoiling/mold issues other reviewers had.
customer_reviews.author: M. Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and better ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a snack for the Fast Metabolism Diet, and they work perfectly. They are pretty tasty and have better ingredients than a lot of other similar products, and no sugar! I will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: LR14

customer_reviews.title: Terrible tasted
customer_reviews.text: This product was to be used as a snack for those on KITO, however it doesn't list the breakdown of fat/protein/carbs. How am I supposed to figure out for my tracking device?? The taste is dreadful - it tastes and smells like chemicals of some kind. Definitely will never order again!
customer_reviews.author: Edie Faylor

customer_reviews.title: This meat stick is my go to when I crave tasty snacks
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure what to make of the meat sticks. But they are delicious, satisfying and a great help in curbing my cravings for tasty quick snacks. I pair it with a string cheese stick for a low carb, hunger control fix.
customer_reviews.author: Music lover

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Meat, Not Lots of Carbs
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't that ^ sound like an ad? It's true, though. There's only one gram of carbs in a pretty darned big stick. And it tastes fresh...it's juicy. Not leathery. I like that in a stick. Good value for the price. I killed these things in like four days and have ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: ScribeBuddy

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Fresh and not to spicy. Well packaged and shipping container intact no damage. If they were not so expensive I would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Donohue

customer_reviews.title: not spicy. not too salty. just right for me and my little boys!
customer_reviews.text: my husband kept buying those nasty jimmy dean beef sticks at the store for my little boys 3 & 7. so I got these as a replacement. they love them! and I love it too as a little mid day protein snack on the go. the packages are a little hard to open for little hands, but I open the top a little before I put into their lunch bags. I just ordered my 2nd batch because the first box went so fast.
customer_reviews.author: cecep

customer_reviews.title: A++ Best taste I've found, awesome customer service A++
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching around for a Keto friendly meat snack for months. This all natural, no BS added product is by far the best. Best tasting, best packaging. I've tried their snack sticks and meat bars, both are great. If you've ever had a Slim Jim, same texture but better taste. And ALL NATURAL. I've tried other bars and they don't even come close. Customer service is outstanding, had an issue with one of the bars I received and they resolved the issue in days.
customer_reviews.author: Aldo G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and yummy.
customer_reviews.text: I am now a repeat customer. I'm now buying for two family members who love beef sticks/jerky but haven't been able to eat them because of allergies to all the junk that are commercially inserted. These Mission Meats sticks not only taste wonderful, but don't have all the fillers etc in them. Trust me.... you will LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally like beef sticks in general, too much fat. But these are absolutely delicious. I suffer from acid reflux which fat can kick off but I had no issues eating these. They taste as fresh as advertised. I bought these for my daughter to have in her lunch bag but now my husband and I are both eating them. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: JD Martin

customer_reviews.title: Too spicy
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these sticks! I tore into them. The first taste is heat. I have a VERY sensitive mouth. Pepper of any kind just burns. Then the texture... Not a big deal, I would leave them open to dry out more. I ordered the jerky too. We'll see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Liz R. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Tasted very smoky.. not in a good way. Heartburn afterwards.
customer_reviews.text: Has a strange aftertaste. It’s filling but not tasty. I would not repurchase this item. I expected it to be very fresh and satisfying. It left me with indigestion. As a celiac I appreciate the ingredients, but the taste was off. Handy easy snack if you can tolerate the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: fran e katzenellenbogen

customer_reviews.title: Tastes REAL
customer_reviews.text: The aroma and the look of these is better than the ones you buy in gas stations...well it better be, the ingredients are better and the way they are made is better. Everything about them say Healthy, Paleo and Gluten Free. I had no stomach upset at all from these. They are my new "go-to" for hiking trips. Very satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Epp-Carter

customer_reviews.title: Not great tasting, but otherwise fine.
customer_reviews.text: The taste is just kind of okay and reminds me a little of dog food. I will eat them, but probably not order again. I do like the fact that there is no sugar, and these are the first I have tried. It is possible that I just need to adjust to food not packed with sugar and other commercial junk.
customer_reviews.author: NateDawgGA

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews on these keto beef sticks. Not all of them were good. I mostly read the bad. Well, I decided to try them anyway. They were delicious! They were not moldy as some stated. They were fresh and tasted great. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: DEBRA R ESTEP

customer_reviews.title: Yummy with great quality!
customer_reviews.text: You have to appreciate the efforts of a business that harvests it's beef from humanly treated, grass fed cattle, coupled with a philosophy of giving back to help others. Now you add to the mix a great recipe, producing a delicious and healthy protein snack and these guys definitely deserve 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Side Up

customer_reviews.title: Meat taste not consistent
customer_reviews.text: I've always enjoyed these very much but this last batch that I got looked paler in color and had a very weird taste to it. It definitely was not what I have had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered twice - very inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Second batch tastes better so far, moister, but are 1 inch shorter. Thats a 10-15% reduction in product.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: More than 1/3 were moldy
customer_reviews.text: The ones that were good were tasty but we had to throw away more than a third. The moldy ones aren't super obvious, just a bit grey in some places, but it is really obvious when you taste them.
customer_reviews.author: Decaf Only

customer_reviews.title: healthy snack
customer_reviews.text: I am addicted to beef sticks and always feel guilty as most are not made from health stuff. If you want something healthy you would have to eat something that dose not taste good. This product has fewer calories and less fat then the beef stick I would normally eat. Makes me feel better eating them. They taste great witch is a great because like I said normally heathy foods don't taste good. Made by a family owned company is a great touch and also makes you feel good to support real people who work hard and care about their customers. Quality product. I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Heckathorn

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I just might be weird for doing this but, I've told my wife she can forget the Christmas candy in my stocking this year. I want more of these! They are delicious and have nothing in them that's bad for you. I'm sure that you won't be disappointed if you buy some. In fact my only recommendation is to buy a bunch or be prepared to reorder some more very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Joe Earl

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like them . . . but
customer_reviews.text: They just taste bad. Maybe a better way to put it is that they have no discernible taste. The texture is very odd, sort of rubbery and spongy. A big turn-off when combined with the with odd taste. I had to spit out my first bite . . . which I cannot say about a lot of foods I've had. An expensive disappointment, because I don't feel it's right to send the remaining 11 back now that I've tried one. Don't Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult to find snacks for our Keto diet that do not have sugar. Even more difficult to find jerky type snacks without sugar. This product is delicious and satisfying. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: slot o honey

customer_reviews.title: Not good beef flavor
customer_reviews.text: Bad flavor. Tastes like older meat with no seasoning. I eat a lot of paleo food and I like epic meats or other brands I buy at Whole Foods because the flavor is good. These aren’t that good. I’ll stick with my normal brands. These are going to the neighborhood kids or the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonbuynature

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: These were really terrible. They tasted old and funky. They were fairly expensive. I would return them if I could. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are very good
customer_reviews.text: I think that these taste better than regular beef sticks that you can buy in convenience stores. I love to pack these in my lunch bag for a snack if needed or take in my purse incase I can't eat when it's time: ). It's good to have a protein snack available.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Bailey

customer_reviews.title: They tasted gross!
customer_reviews.text: I loved prior sticks, got a pack of 12 and this time tasted weird and where soft??
customer_reviews.author: Tena Bock

customer_reviews.title: Taste great and great ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic. Only one real complaint and hopefully they will source same quality products at lower pricing and pass it along to the consume. Pricing is really high. I will continue to support because I want to see more of these types of products succeed.
customer_reviews.author: Chiraz

customer_reviews.title: These were quite tasty....
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to snack on while watching what I was eating before an upcoming vacation. They were really good. I saw some complaints about defective product but every one of the sticks I got were tasty and fresh. I suppose the only problem was that I ate them too fast. Will definitely reorder in the future...
customer_reviews.author: E Trane

customer_reviews.title: The real reason for celery juice or powder
customer_reviews.text: Celery juice is not a common spice for beef. Companies add it for the nitrate/nitrite and hope customers will not realize they are lying when they say their product is nitrate/nitrite free. We need a Federal regulation about celery, don't you think?
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: A bit spicy
customer_reviews.text: I like spicy, but wouldn't want them any hotter. Too hot for my wife. The wrapper is easy to open, and flavor is great. The listed ingredients should qualify this for the Health Food section. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Healthy AND Tasty
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor and texture of these mighty beef sticks! Made so healthy for you! I am hoping they come down in price after so many people try these great snacks. So, for now, I still will purchase because of the quality of these beef sticks!! Thank you for creating such an overall healthy and tasty product!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: Very Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant on ordering with some reviewers stated they received moldy sticks. I decided to order despite it, and so glad I did. These are so tasty and filling. I am on the Keto diet and these fit into the diet perfectly. My only complaint is that they are too expensive and I wish you guys would lower the prices, but I get it. I will order again but just don't know when. Keep making a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gina  cartagena

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty and no additives
customer_reviews.text: This actually tastes good and has no additives. It is very hard to find products like this, but it is worth paying more for products that don't have additives (e.g. nitrates, unpronounceable chemicals, ...).
customer_reviews.author: Serious Sam

customer_reviews.title: Hide them as soon as you get them!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best stick meats ever, yum yum yum!!! My husband loves this kind of stuff but I really purchased them for me because I have gone to Keto eating. In the past 7 months I have lost 95 lbs and thought this would be something different as I usually don't eat something like this. I made the mistake and opened 1 with my husband . He loves them so now I have to hide some for me or I won't have any to take to work. Thanks for making such a great snack:-)
customer_reviews.author: john gray

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like beef jerky, so I was surprised that I liked these. I bought them because I’ve started keto, want non-GMO, sugar-free, nitrate free snacks I can take with me on the road when I travel. Nothing worse than being stuck in an airport with no good food alternatives! These were fresh and tasty and I will order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy A. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Tastes HORRIBLE.  Very salty.  Outside like rubber.  Bad value
customer_reviews.text: Tastes horrible. Salty as hell. Too expensive, poor quantity. DO NOT WASTE MONEY
customer_reviews.author: LouLou

customer_reviews.title: If a meat stick could taste like regret, this is it.
customer_reviews.text: No one in my house liked these meat sticks. I got "why does this taste like disappointment" and "it tastes like it crawled out of someone's sewer. There is no reason with their ingredients that these meat sticks should taste like this. I do now, however, have snacks for guests that I wish to leave. Or a nice revenge gift.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Best healthy beef sticks ever!
customer_reviews.text: It's about time for remembering, we are what we eat. These amazing flavors are a great source of energy that we all should have a few packages set aside. But if you are like me, you'll eat those too! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: John White

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting and all sticks well sealed
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about the problems people have had with the vacuum seal failing but took a chance anyway. I am glad I did. The beef sticks are great. I haven't had the vacuum sealing fail on any of the package of 12 sticks that I ordered and would get these again. It appears that whatever problems that existed in the past have been resolved from what I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: mac1319

customer_reviews.title: My wife says it tastes like a tire, and I agree
customer_reviews.text: While the ingredients of this product are "clean," the taste is pretty bad. I wish I hasn't bought so much... I don't know how I am going to stand to eat the remaining sticks. I was thinking the product would taste more like beef jerky? It's definitely not worth the money, at all.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hilley

customer_reviews.title: A healthy, tasty, pick-me-up
customer_reviews.text: I was working at a job where I didn't have the opportunity to stop for lunch after a morning shift. So I took these beef sticks with me to nibble on during my interstate commute home. They taste great, have a pleasing texture, and are a good pick-me-up after a physical morning. I also like that they are made without all the hormones and antibiotics of regular commercial beef.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Bittinger

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless
customer_reviews.text: There is no tases to it, tastes like crap toss in the trash, and will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: High Protein on the go
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor, not too tough and not too soft. I was looking for a high protein snack that satisfied the urge to "chew" at the same time and this does the trick. Great for any time but especially for the early afternoon munchies and way better for me than a candy bar! I've also place a couple in my car for those "too busy" days with no time to stop for lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Zeebra

product_meta.title: Mission Meats Keto Sugar Free Grass-Fed Beef Snacks Sticks Non-GMO Gluten Free MSG Free Nitrate Nitrite Free Paleo Healthy Natural Meat Sticks Beef Jerky (12-Count)
feature_bullets: ⭑ MADE WITH ONLY THE BEST GRASS FED BEEF! 100% NON-GMO Citric Acid. Only the good stuff in these Grass-fed Beef Sticks.
⭑ BEEF STICKS WITH NO ADDED NITRATES OR NITRITES. Paleo friendly meat snack sticks are great on the go under 100 calorie snacks!
⭑ GLUTEN FREE AND MSG FREE BEEF BAR SNACKS! No added hormones and are 100% antibiotic free beef sticks. Sugar free, high protein & low carb.
⭑ EACH PURCHASE YOU MAKE SUPPORTS AMAZING ORGANIZATIONS. We support one for one causes, that’s our mission. Meat snacks that give back!
⭑ ZERO CARB GRASS FED BEEF STICKS YOU WILL LOVE! Meat sticks you will reorder! Individually wrapped beef sticks that will make you leave jerky.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
